analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0x179d2b800fa10cca26f8901707120dbae20641cc.sol#289-305) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/34/0x179d2b800fa10cca26f8901707120dbae20641cc.sol#300-303)

Crowdsale.destroy (/unique_chucks/34/0x179d2b800fa10cca26f8901707120dbae20641cc.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/34/0x179d2b800fa10cca26f8901707120dbae20641cc.sol)

Crowdsale.endTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0x179d2b800fa10cca26f8901707120dbae20641cc.sol#233-234)
